    public static class JsonRpcEndpoint.JsonRpcMethod<P,R>
extends JsonRpcEndpoint.JsonRpcRequest<P,R>
    A JSON RPC request that calls a certain RPC method.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JsonRpcMethod

        public JsonRpcMethod(java.lang.String sMethod,
                     P rDefaultParams,
                     java.lang.Class<R> rResponseType)
        Creates a new instance that uses input values directly as RPC call parameters.
        Parameters:
        sMethod - The name of the RPC method to invoke
        rDefaultParams - Default parameters for the method invocation
        rResponseType - The target datatype to parse the response with

      • JsonRpcMethod

        public JsonRpcMethod(java.lang.String sMethod,
                     P rDefaultParams,
                     java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,R> fParseResponse)
        Creates a new instance that uses input values directly as RPC call parameters.
        Parameters:
        sMethod - The name of the RPC method to invoke
        rDefaultParams - Default parameters for the method invocation
        fParseResponse - A function that parses the JSON response string into the result type

      • JsonRpcMethod

        public JsonRpcMethod(java.lang.String sMethod,
                     P rDefaultParams,
                     java.util.function.Function<P,?> fConvertInput,
                     java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,R> fParseResponse)
        Creates a new instance that converts input values into before using them as RPC call parameters.
        Parameters:
        sMethod - The name of the RPC method to invoke
        rDefaultParams - Default parameters for the method invocation
        fConvertInput - A function that converts input parameters to the actual value to be used in the request
        fParseResponse - A function that parses the JSON response string into the result type

        Specified by:
        buildRequest in class JsonRpcEndpoint.JsonRpcRequest<P,R>
        Parameters:

      • getInputConversion

        public java.util.function.Function<P,?> getInputConversion()
        Returns the function that is used to convert input values. If not set otherwise the default is an identity function that returns the input value unchanged.
        Returns:
        The input conversion function

      • getRequestParams

        protected java.lang.Object getRequestParams(P rInput)
        Returns the value for the "params" property of a request. The default implementation just returns the input value. Subclasses can override this to extend or modify the method input.
        Parameters:
        rInput - The method input
        Returns:
        The actual request params

      • parseResult

        protected R parseResult(java.lang.String sJsonResult)
        Parses the result of a remote method call into the target datatype. The default implementation invokes Json.parse(String, Class).
        Specified by:
        parseResult in class JsonRpcEndpoint.JsonRpcRequest<P,R>
        Parameters:
        sJsonResult - The raw JSON result field of the request
        Returns:
        The parsed value
